title: R & D expenditure of BP 2010 to 2018
summary: In general Expenditure in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.

Expenditure in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, gradually decreasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Expenditure in million U.S. dollars, about 707.0 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest Expenditure in million U.S. dollars, of value 391.0 was reported at Year 2017
